prize.displayDescription:
This prize is sponsored by Fanatical. 

Play at being a Hired Gun

The money’s good, the dog’s loyal, and the recruitment process is simple. Play challenges with OMEN Rewards for your chance to win a free copy of Necromunda: Hired Gun!

Random winner will be selected on 5/30/2021

Necromunda: Hired Gun Game Key("Promotion").

Successfully complete the challenge for a chance to win a Necromunda: Hired Gun Game Key!

Sweepstakes Rules
NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER TO WIN. Please read the description of the sweepstakes available in the Game ("Initial Rules") provided with the relevant sweepstakes and the following master official rules ("Master Rules" and, together with the Initial Rules, " Rules") before entering the Promotion. By entering the Promotion, you ("Entrant") agree to be bound by the Rules and represent that you all eligibility requirements for the Promotion. Must be eighteen (18) years or older. "Promotion Period" begins on 5/27/21 08:00:00 AM and ends on 5/29/21 8:00:00 AM ("Deadline").  Winner will be selected randomly from among all eligible entries received during Promotion Period. Entries must be submitted by the Deadline to be eligible to win. Only eligible Entrants will be eligible to win (one) 1 Necromunda: Hired Gun Game Key ("Prize") per household. Winner must follow instructions and respond with information or documents requested prior to 5/31/21 11:59 pm. Sponsor reserves, in its sole discretion, the right to extend Promotion Period for any reason without notice.

© 2021 Focus Multimedia Ltd. All rights reserved. All trademarks are property of their respective owners.

prize.displayDescription:
This offer is only valid for German Slippers customers.

*$8 Off Wool Slippers and Leather Sandals valid for German Slippers customers. Limit one promotion for first time customer. Cannot be combined with other offers or promotions. Only Wool Slippers and Leather Sandals. Exclusions apply.

About German Slippers

German-Slippers is the gate to the world of fine Austrian and German clogs, mules, home shoes, house and bedroom slippers for people of all ages and from all walks of life. We offer 100% free shipping worldwide on all our house shoes!
